name: Ibis Pau Centre

reviews.text: We stayed here in July 2012. We stayed in a larger room as we were travelling with our two small children aged 1 and 3 at the time. The hotel provided two baby travel beds which was perfectly adequate. We were all in the same room though which meant going to bed earlier than normal.
reviews.title: A good hotel in a good location

reviews.text: Hotel room was clean and furntiture was fine. Parking was included.
reviews.title: Impressive!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed May 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Breakfast was very good. I enjoyed squeezing my own orange juice each day. Staff were pleasant and accommodating. I don't think there was any room service available but I can't remember. there is certainly no other meal available.
reviews.title: Clean, good service and location

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed October 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Location was good... just a short walk to the centre. Parking was secure.
reviews.title: Basic Ibis standard

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed December 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: If this is typical Ibis I might be staying there more often. Clean, well kept, warm and comfortable. The room was a little small but I was alone so that was not a problem. The bathroom was standard and very clean, though a bit small. Good shower. The staff at the desk was very helpful and the location was perfect.
reviews.title: OK for a night

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed December 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Although the hotel is in a perfect position in the centre of town the rooms are very very small. To try and fit into the bathroom is nearly impossible, and not a great deal of space around the bed, or to store suitcases. The car park is also very small and hard to manover into the few spaces. The hotel itself was clean and tidy, with the normal Ibis breakfast. The staff were also very helpfull
reviews.title: Can not swing a cat

reviews.text: Recently renovated, to reach Accor 's new quality standards. Professional staff, customer-friendly crew, what else ? Typical Ibis settings, with small rooms, flat TV set, clean bathroom. Don't miss the Cannelés at breakfast !
reviews.title: Perfect Fit For Downtown Business

reviews.text: First impression is of an attractive hotel in the centre of Pau. I stayed only 1 night and found it adequate although the room was small. As usual with an Ibis, the air conditioning is a problem: normally it's blowing warm air as an economy measure even if the weather is sweltering. This time it was the opposite problem in that it was blowing quite cold air yet there was no way of heating the room. Fortunately the weather wasn't cold but the night was quite chilly.
reviews.title: a pleasant one night stay

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed September 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.title: Holiday en route stop

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed August 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: There should be a button on televisions that stop people having it very loud. We ended up ready to ask reception to ask the people somewhere in the hall to turn down their TV at 2 AM..... Walls paper thin. Breakfast okay, but would go to a service station next time we are in the area for breakfast.
reviews.title: stop over

reviews.text: usual ibis standard very small carpark easily found ideal stopover on way from coast of spain to north of france for ferry. breakfast available but at 9 euros not worth it close to the motorway for quick exit so all in all a effect stop off location that i would use again happy travelling
reviews.title: Decent for an overnight stay

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed May 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Decent hotel to stay overnight - clean rooms and not too far (10 minute walk) from restaurants etc. Would recommend to select a non-smoking room. 'You get what you pay for'
reviews.title: Small Car park

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed September 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We stayed here as part of a road trip that took us from Barcelona, Spain into the South of France. My wife made the reservation and I was a bit reluctanct at first because of the cost; I believed that you got what you paid for and that this stay would be lacking in comfort. Well, I was wrong. The room was very comfortable, albeit a bit small. However, it was very clean and we got free wi-fi. The staff was great and the location of the hotel was the very best feature as it was within walking distance of all the charming historical sites of the town, as well as the main plaza. Would certainly recommend!
reviews.title: Great Surprise
great location, great service
reviews.text: this is a great hotel to stay in. the rooms are clean and the service was great. the manager was extremely friendly and helpful. the rooms are small as all ibis hotels but are clean. the location is great as its in the middle of town and you can walk anywhere.

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed September 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: i would recommend taking a taxi to it as you wont need a car if you want to explore the city. finding the hotel is tricky becuase of all the one way streets but not difficult if you have a good map.
reviews.title: Pau, Pyrenees.

description: The Ibis Pau Centre hotel is located facing the central post office. Only 20 min from the airport, it is close to numerous restaurants. It has 60 air-conditioned rooms, including 3 adapted to receive disabled guests, a bar serving light meals and snacks 24/24 and private covered parking. A meeting room can be booked for the organisation of conferences. Guests on a business trip will appreciate the Wifi wireless Internet access. Golf 5 km, tennis 7 km.
